MacroOp.Name: OMNI_SHOW_DEBUG_ERR
MacroOp.Brief: Displays errors as part of the debug output.
MacroOp.Description: When specified, all error debug output will be displayed.
MacroOp.Notes: OMNI_SHOW_DEBUG must be specified for this flag to work.
MacroOp.Synopsis: #define OMNI_SHOW_DEBUG_ERR Signifies to show any error output.
